words.tips: 【联想】在“”的典型场景中频繁造句，用“Germany”描述关键动作/特征；【图像】脑海中构建一个与“”强相关的画面，并反复配音念出“Germany”；【拆分】G·erm·any → 逐段拼读+拼写，朗读3遍固化肌肉记忆
words.example: The Germany has become increasingly important in discussions about environmental protection.
words.example_translation: The Germany has become increasingly 重要的 in discussions about 环境保护.
